correspAction.name: the Société Impériale Zoologique d'Acclimatation, Paris

head.supplied: [Messrs Wilson and Mueller send from Melbourne (Australia) their thanks for the honorary memberships that the Society awarded to them at the Annual Meeting on 14 February last. ¶ See Société Impériale...

div.p: To the Société Impériale Zoologique d'Acclimatation, Paris

Letter not found. The text given here is from Bulletin de la Société Impériale Zoologique d'Acclimatation, vol. 8 (1861), p. 345. It is dated to April as the latest likely date that it could have been written to have been reported at the meeting of the society held on 14 June 1861.
[MM. Wilson et Mueller adressent de Melbourne (Australie) leurs remerciments pour le titre de membres honoraires que la Société leur a décerné dans la séance annuelle du 14 février dernier.]

p.seg: [Messrs Wilson and Mueller send from Melbourne (Australia) their thanks for the honorary memberships that the Society awarded to them at the Annual Meeting on 14 February last.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: See Société Impériale Zoologique d'Acclimatation to M, 14 February 1861, and Count d'Eprémesnil to M, 15 February 1861.
